Package utils

Class DateTime

java.lang.Object
utils.DateTime
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DateTime extends Object implements Serializable
A class to be used application wide where date and/or time is needed. This class implements Serializable so it's safe to use across network calls.
Version:
1.0.0 - April 2024
Author:
Alexandru Tofan

    • getSortableTime

      public String getSortableTime()
      A method that can be used to get the time in the format yyyy-MM-dd-HH-mm-ss. This works better for when you need to for ex. sort by time.
      Returns:
      the sortable formatted time string
